import React, { LegacyRef, MutableRefObject, RefObject } from 'react' import { FormEventHandler } from 'react' import { MouseEventHandler } from 'react' interface PostFeedProp { setMessage : Function, onSubmit: FormEventHandler, setFile : Function, formRef : MutableRefObject } function PostFeedDumb(prop : PostFeedProp) { return (

prop.setMessage(e.target.value)} required>

prop.setFile(e.target.files ? e.target.files[0] : undefined)}>
) } export default PostFeedDumb
